item.title: Portions From John Pt5: A Tested Friendship
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Join us for the revealing story of 'A Tested Friendship' in the fifth of our studies in 'Portions From John'. We meet three friends of Jesus, and learn the type of Friend He is, and how He wants to befriend you. Earthly friends may fail us, or find themselves powerless to help, but this Divine Friend can be counted on for every circumstance and in every time of need. Most importantly, He can meet your greatest need: your need of salvation. Don't miss this comforting and encouraging message from John's Gospel. This sermon is available at http://www.preachtheword.com now in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Featured Items For June
item.description: The featured sermon for June is entitled 'True Greatness', and our featured study series for the month looks at 'The Romance Of Redemption And Revival In Ruth'. Our featured Gospel message brings before us 'The Great White Throne Judgement'...

item.title: Gospel Sermon: Lot's Chosen Lot
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: In Genesis 19 we read the story of 'Lot's Chosen Lot'. Join with us for this Gospel Sermon, as we see how Lot's choice affected his life, and the lives of his family. Have you chosen to go the way of the world? As you once again face the choice of God's way or your way, will you choose a new beginning in Jesus Christ? This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Portions From John Pt4: Aiming High By Stooping Low
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Don't miss part 4 of our series of studies entitled 'Portions From John', where we learn about 'Aiming High By Stooping Low'. This time we come to chapter 13, and the moving story of events in the Upper Room, when the Lord Jesus washed His disciples' feet. What was the significance of this act, and what was He seeking to teach the disciples and us through this powerful object lesson? Listen for the practical demonstration in this sermon of how service to others should impact both our lives and theirs. This sermon is available at http://www.preachtheword.com now in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Portions From John Pt3: The Good Shepherd
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: In the third part of our series of sermons on 'Portions From John' we come to the well-known passage in chapter 10, where Jesus relates the story of 'The Good Shepherd'. What are the characteristics of this Good Shepherd? How can we tell false shepherds from true shepherds? Don't miss this encouraging message, as we learn how the Good Shepherd loves His sheep and cares for them. This sermon is available at http://www.preachtheword.com now in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Topical Sermon: Forgiveness, The Key To Deliverance
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Join us for this liberating Topical Sermon, in which David Legge urges us to experience and demonstrate 'Forgiveness: The Key To Deliverance' in our lives. Many people are living in the grip of an unforgiving spirit, which has serious ramifications for their Christian lives. Join us for this practical guidance which will help you break free from the prison of unforgiveness using the key to deliverance which is forgiveness. This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: SPECIAL EVANGELISTIC MESSAGE: A Titanic Reminder
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: As the world marks the 100th anniversary of the sinking of the Titanic, which was built here in Northern Ireland, we pause to reflect on the vital lessons we can learn from this tragic event. In 'A Titanic Reminder', we see the brevity of life and the suddenness with which it can come to an unexpected end. Are you ready? This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Portions From John Pt2: Reasons For Unbelief In Christ
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: In part 2 of our new series looking at well-known 'Portions From John', David Legge continues in chapter 9 of John's Gospel where we find some of the 'Reasons For Unbelief In Christ'. Last time we began looking at the story of the man born blind, but now we see the reasons for the unbelief of those who questioned how he had received his sight. What is the reason for your unbelief, or that of those around you? Join us for this sermon which is available at http://www.preachtheword.com now in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Portions From John Pt1: Sin, Suffering And The Saviour
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Join us for sermons from selected passages in John's Gospel. This 'Portions From John' study series will share on some well-known passages in the Gospel of John. We begin in John 9, as we look at the story of the man born blind who received his sight from the Lord Jesus. Under the heading of 'Sin, Suffering And The Saviour' we examine this man's story and the implications for us today. What was the cause of his suffering and, more importantly, what was the cure? This sermon is available at http://www.preachtheword.com now in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: NEW SERIES: Portions From John
item.description: Our next Bible Study series at Preach The Word will feature sermons from selected passages in the Gospel of John. Join us as David Legge brings us challenging messages from chapters 9-13 of John's Gospel in 'Portions From John'...

item.title: Topical Sermon: Demonised Christians
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Join us for this challenging Topical Sermon, in which David Legge addresses the delicate subject of 'Demonised Christians'. Do you believe in the devil? Do you believe in demons? Are you aware that the devil and demons are a threat to Christians? Don't miss this helpful message which aims to see your mental, emotional, spiritual and moral bondage broken! This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in various video, 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: The God Of Justice Pt5: The Sentence
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Don't miss part 5, the conclusion of our series of studies looking at 'The God Of Justice' seen acting in the book of Amos. We come now to the climax of this courtroom drama, in which 'The Sentence' is finally brought for the three charges we have seen God bring against the accused. What will the verdict be? What is God's verdict on us? When judgement comes how will we fare? Don't miss the challenging conclusion of this convicting series! This sermon is available at http://www.preachtheword.com now in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: SERIES COMPLETE: The God Of Justice
item.description: David Legge's series on 'The God Of Justice', which has brought us through the book of Amos, is now complete. This 5-part series is now available as a free e-Book download in Adobe PDF, Amazon Kindle and various other formats from our Book Store. The audio for the entire series can also be downloaded in WMA or MP3 formats.

item.title: The God Of Justice Pt4: The Third Charge, Apathy
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: In part 4 of our series of studies entitled 'The God Of Justice', taking us through the Minor Prophet of Amos, we see 'The Third Charge, Apathy', which is brought against the accused people. This final charge has great application today in our churches and our lives. Our dry-eyed complacency stands in stark contrast to the prophet's cries, and challenges us to seek God for a revival in our lands, churches and lives. This sermon is available at http://www.preachtheword.com now in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: The God Of Justice Pt3: The Second Charge, Affluence
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Join us for part 3 of our series of studies looking at 'The God Of Justice' as depicted in the book of Amos. In this third message we hear of 'The Second Charge, Affluence' brought against the nation of Israel. Could this same charge be applied to us in our day? Are we living beyond our means? Do we spend the riches God has blessed us with selfishly on ourselves, instead of using them wisely for the furtherance of His Gospel? Don't miss this challenging message from the book of Amos. This sermon is available at http://www.preachtheword.com now in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Topical Sermon: Christianity On Fire
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Our latest Topical Sermon asks: is your 'Christianity On Fire'? Fire is often used in Scripture as a symbol of the Holy Spirit. Yet in many of our lives and churches, there is little or no evidence that we have been ignited. Join us as David Legge challenges us regarding the absence of fire in our churches and in our Christian lives. This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in various video, 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: The God Of Justice Pt2: The First Charge, Aimlessness
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: In part 2 of our new series 'The God Of Justice', David Legge continues through the book of Amos by presenting 'The First Charge: Aimlessness'. Do you have a focus and a vision? Are you in touch with God? Are you walking with Him? Or are you simply aimlessly wandering through your Christian life? Join us for this sermon which is available at http://www.preachtheword.com now in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: The God Of Justice Pt1: The Accused
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Join us as we study 'The God Of Justice' in this new series through the Old Testament Minor Prophet of Amos. In part 1 we are introduced to 'The Accused' - the eight nations charged by God, which include the northern kingdom of Israel and the southern kingdom of Judah. These nations stand accused by the God of Justice, but what would His charge be against our nation? What could He charge us with in our churches and our lives? This sermon is available at http://www.preachtheword.com now in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Gospel Sermon: David Legge's Testimony
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Join us for 'David Legge's Testimony'. In this new Gospel Sermon, David Legge takes the opportunity to give the testimony of how he came to faith in Jesus Christ, and how the Lord has led him over the years to where he is in his ministry today. Perhaps you have had a similar upbringing, in a Christian family, going to a local church - but have you ever come to a personal knowledge of Jesus Christ as your Lord and Saviour? This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Topical Sermon: Never Forget What God Remembers
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: As we enter a New Year, David Legge brings us a word of encouragement from Psalm 103, as he reminds us we should 'Never Forget What God Remembers'. The incoming year will, no doubt, hold all sorts of trials and tribulations for each and every one of us - but God knows our limitations, and we must remember that He will never forget our weaknesses. He knows exactly what we are capable of, and how much strength we will need this year and every year of our lives. This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in various video, 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Topical Sermon: Put On The Garment Of Praise
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Have you ever 'Put On The Garment Of Praise' described for us in Isaiah 61? Join us for this new Topical Sermon, in which David Legge encourages us to take off our old garments of heaviness, which weigh us down and hinder our spiritual progress, and replace them with garments of praise and thanksgiving. Perhaps you once wore these garments of praise, but have gone back to the old garments of pessimism, murmuring, and complaining? Don't miss this challenge from the Scriptures. This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: The Presence Of God Pt5: In The New Jerusalem
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Don't miss part 5, the conclusion of our series of studies tracing 'The Presence Of God' throughout eternal history. We come now to the grand climax of God's plan as we look at how the Presence of God will be revealed 'In The New Jerusalem'. In the eternal state, how will we experience God's presence and glory? What fellowship awaits believers in this future day? Join with us as we reflect on what we have learned in this series and look forward to 'the holy city' when 'the tabernacle of God is with men'. This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: SERIES COMPLETE: The Presence Of God
item.description: David Legge's series on 'The Presence Of God', which has sought to trace the presence of God throughout history, is now complete. This 5-part series is now available as a free e-Book download in Adobe PDF, Amazon Kindle or Microsoft XPS formats from our Book Store. The audio for the entire series can also be downloaded in WMA or MP3 formats.

item.title: The Presence Of God Pt4: In Pentecost
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Join us for part 4 of our series of studies looking at 'The Presence Of God'. We have traced God's presence from the Garden of Eden to the ultimate manifestation in Immanuel, our Lord Jesus Christ. In this message we move to examine 'The Presence Of God In Pentecost'. When Christ told His disciples that He would send 'another Helper', what did He mean? What part does the Holy Spirit play in manifesting the presence and glory of God? How should this be seen and experienced today? This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: The Presence Of God Pt3: In Immanuel
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Join us for part 3 of our series of studies tracing 'The Presence Of God' throughout history. In this third message we move from the Old to the New Testament, where we see 'The Presence Of God In Immanuel'. We look at how the presence and glory of God was, is, and ever will be manifested in His Beloved Son, Jesus Christ. Join us as we gaze on the climax of God's revelation of Himself in Immanuel, God With Us. This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Gospel Sermon: Salvation Sticking Points
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: In our latest Gospel Sermon, Evangelist David Legge asks: what are your 'Salvation Sticking Points'? Are you aware of your need of salvation, yet still something hinders you in coming to Christ? What is that obstacle? What is it that is standing in the way of your salvation? Join us now as we consider how your sticking points can be overcome! This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: The Presence Of God Pt2: In The Tabernacle And Temple
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: In part 2 of our look at 'The Presence Of God' throughout history, we move on in time from the Garden Of Eden to the times when God's presence was manifested 'In The Tabernacle And Temple'. We begin by looking at the Tabernacle in the wilderness, where God's Shekinah glory dwelt among His people. We then move on to see how His presence dwelt in Solomon's Temple, and how ultimately His presence was lost to the people because of their idolatry. How does this history of the presence of God relate to our experience today? Join us for this sermon which is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: The Presence Of God Pt1: In The Garden
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: In this new series, David Legge will be seeking to trace in Scripture 'The Presence Of God' as it has been manifested throughout history. In our first study, we begin at Genesis where we see how God's presence was encountered 'In The Garden', as Adam and Eve lived in the paradise of Eden. How did Adam and Eve experience the presence of God? How does their experience relate to ours today? They ultimately lost this close sense of God's presence - have we lost it too? This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Topical Sermon: The Cry From The Cave
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Have you ever felt that you are trapped in a cave? In our new Topical Sermon we hear 'The Cry From The Cave' recorded by David in Psalm 57. What was his cry? How did he get through his cave experience? Join us as we learn some practical truths that will help each and every one of us when we find ourselves in one of life's caves. This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Studies In Mark Pt57: Fear
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Our 'Studies In Mark' conclude with a look at the remainder of chapter 16, focusing on the 'Fear' the disciples experienced after the crucifixion of Christ. Their doubt and disbelief when word began to spread of Christ's resurrection only served to increase their despair. Are you living under a similar cloud of fear, depression, or doubt? Have you experienced the power of the resurrection in your life? Join us now for the conclusion of our journey through Mark's Gospel. This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: SERIES COMPLETE: Studies In Mark
item.description: David Legge's series of 'Studies In Mark', which has brought us through Mark's Gospel, is now complete. This 57-part series is now available as a free e-Book download in Adobe PDF, Amazon Kindle or Microsoft XPS formats from our Book Store. The audio for the entire series can also be downloaded in WMA or MP3 formats.

item.title: Studies In Mark Pt56: Golgotha
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: For our penultimate study in Mark's Gospel, we witness the shocking brutality of 'Golgotha'. The physical, mental and emotional sufferings of Christ on Calvary are laid out for us in the Gospels, but we must not miss the greater spiritual suffering He endured in paying the price for our sins. Have you seen the crucified Christ as He suffered for you on the cross? Join us as we turn our gaze on Him, and anticipate His resurrection in the following chapter. This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Studies In Mark Pt55: Trial And Denial
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: The 'Trial And Denial' of Christ are the focus of our 55th 'Studies In Mark' message. The Lord Jesus is brought before the Sanhedrin and Pontius Pilate in an illegal mock trial, resulting in His sentence of death by crucifixion. Meanwhile, Peter cowers in the background, and ultimately denies His Lord with oaths and curses. Join us as we study this solemn scene as recorded in Mark's Gospel. This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Studies In Mark Pt54: The Agony Of Gethsemane
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: In part 54 of our 'Studies In Mark', the scene shifts to the Garden of Gethsemane. We see 'The Agony Of Gethsemane' for the Lord Jesus Christ as His disciples flee, and He is betrayed by Judas Iscariot. Those moments alone in Gethsemane held great significance, as Christ endured great sorrow and distress as He anticipated what lay before Him in the 'Countdown To Calvary'. This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Studies In Mark Pt53: The Sop And The Supper
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: We join Christ and His disciples in the Upper Room, the scene of the Last Supper, for part 53 of our 'Studies In Mark'. In this sermon, 'The Sop And The Supper', we look at the circumstances of the Last Supper, what Christ was seeking to portray, what it meant then and what it means for us today. This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Video Sermon: Eureka!
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: In John chapter 1 we read of Philip's 'Eureka!' moment, when he realised who Jesus Christ really was. Are you ignoring Christ because you have mistakenly focused on the church or on Christians? Don't make the mistake of failing to look at Christ Himself, examine Him and His claims, and make your own informed decision about who He is! You can still have your own 'Eureka!' moment! This new Gospel Sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in various video formats, as well as the usual 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Studies In Mark Pt52: A Miserable Betrayer and An Extravagant Worshipper
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Join us for a fresh look at the familiar stories of 'A Miserable Betrayer and An Extravagant Worshipper' in part 52 of our 'Studies In Mark' - part 4 of the 'Countdown To Calvary' sub-series. The well-known story of Judas Iscariot and his betrayal of Christ is contrasted with the example of the woman in Simon's house who anointed Christ's head with ointment. To which of these could you be compared? Miserable betrayer or extravagant worshipper? This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Studies In Mark Pt51: Signs Of The Second Coming
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: Part 51 of our 'Studies In Mark' forms part 3 of the 'Countdown To Calvary' sub-series. We arrive at chapter 13 of Mark's Gospel, in which he records the famous 'Olivet Discourse'. Christ takes time with Peter, James, John and Andrew on the Mount of Olives to tell them of the 'Signs Of The Second Coming'. These warning signs are applicable today more than ever - are you watching for them? Will you be ready when the signs give way to the event of His return? This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Topical Sermon: Only A Rod
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: This new Topical Sermon examines what God can do with 'Only A Rod'. Moses had spent 40 years in the Midianite desert, as God prepared him for the huge task that lay ahead: leading the people of Israel out of Egypt to the Promised Land. Before Moses could be presented with the prospect of this unimaginable undertaking, God had to bring brokenness into his life, so that He could use him once again. Are you broken? Do you, like Moses, feel useless before God? Come and see how God can use 'Only A Rod'! This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Studies In Mark Pt50: Question Time
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: In the 50th part of our 'Studies In Mark', we continue our look at the final week of Christ's life on earth with part 2 of the sub-series 'Countdown To Calvary'. We come to the examination of the Lord Jesus by the Sanhedrin, the Jewish ruling body. This 'Question Time' covers a wide range of subjects, but the Lord Jesus passes their every test, and then poses a question of His own. How would you have responded? This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: Studies In Mark Pt49: The Servant King's Short-Lived Welcome
item.author: info@preachtheword.com (Preach The Word)
item.description: As we come to the final week of our Lord's life on earth, as recorded in Mark's Gospel, Part 49 of our 'Studies In Mark' begins a sub-series entitled 'Countdown To Calvary'. In this message we see 'The Servant King's Short-Lived Welcome', as Jesus makes His triumphal entry into Jerusalem riding on a donkey. This fulfilment of Old Testament prophecy is closely followed by a depiction of the fruitlessness of Israel in the cursing of the fig tree - but what about you? Is your life bearing fruit, or are you just taking up space? This sermon is available now from http://www.preachtheword.com in 32K MP3, 64K MP3, WMA and text formats...

item.title: NEW SUB-SERIES: Countdown To Calvary
item.description: Join us for this new component to our 'Studies In Mark'. As we progress through Mark's Gospel, we come to his depiction of the final week of Christ's time here on earth. Spanning chapters 11-16, this portion of our studies comes under the heading 'Countdown To Calvary'...
